metadata.title: CVE-2022-3116 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Heimdal Software Kerberos 5 implementation is vulnerable to a nullpointer dereferance. An attacker with network access to an application thatdepends on the vulnerable code path can cause the application to crash.

criterions.comment: heimdal: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
